channel.title: Visual Studio Code on Pi4J
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Studio Code on Pi4J

item.title: Java development with VSC
item.description: Java on the Raspberry Pi To use Pi4J V.2 you’ll need Java 11 or newer. Luckily this version is included in the current version of Raspberry Pi OS. In the release notes you can see that the version of 2019-06-20 includes OpenJDK Java 11: 2019-06-20: Based on Debian Buster Oracle Java 7 and 8 replaced with OpenJDK 11 But you will need to keep in mind this version is only compatible with ARMv7 or higher and doesn’t support all Raspberry Pi board versions.
